goal (10 subgoals):
 1. \<And>\<Gamma> \<Delta>.
       \<bottom> \<in># \<Gamma> \<Longrightarrow>
       tms \<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> tms \<Delta>

       \<lbrakk>Atom k \<in># \<Gamma>; Atom k \<in># \<Delta>\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> tms \<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> tms \<Delta>
 3. \<And>\<Gamma> F \<Delta>.
       \<lbrakk>\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> F, \<Delta>;
        tms \<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> tms (F, \<Delta>)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> tms (\<^bold>\<not> F, \<Gamma>) \<Rightarrow>
                         tms \<Delta>
 4. \<And>F \<Gamma> \<Delta>.
       \<lbrakk>F, \<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> \<Delta>;
        tms (F, \<Gamma>) \<Rightarrow> tms \<Delta>\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> tms \<Gamma> \<Rightarrow>
                         tms (\<^bold>\<not> F, \<Delta>)
 5. \<And>F G \<Gamma> \<Delta>.
       \<lbrakk>F, G, \<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> \<Delta>;
        tms (F, G, \<Gamma>) \<Rightarrow> tms \<Delta>\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> tms (F \<^bold>\<and> G, \<Gamma>) \<Rightarrow>
                         tms \<Delta>
 6. \<And>\<Gamma> F \<Delta> G.
       \<lbrakk>\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> F, \<Delta>;
        tms \<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> tms (F, \<Delta>);
        \<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> G, \<Delta>;
        tms \<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> tms (G, \<Delta>)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> tms \<Gamma> \<Rightarrow>
                         tms (F \<^bold>\<and> G, \<Delta>)
 7. \<And>F \<Gamma> \<Delta> G.
       \<lbrakk>F, \<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> \<Delta>;
        tms (F, \<Gamma>) \<Rightarrow> tms \<Delta>;
        G, \<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> \<Delta>;
        tms (G, \<Gamma>) \<Rightarrow> tms \<Delta>\<rbrakk>

                         tms \<Delta>
 8. \<And>\<Gamma> F G \<Delta>.
